text: Nambo ŵanganyao ŵatite: “(Ayi yaakuŵecheta Muhammadi ﷺ iŵele) sagamisi syewanganyichilane.” (Ndaŵi jine akutiji): “Nambo jute kuilukanya (nsyene).” (Pane ni akutiji): “Nambo jwalakweju nkwimba ilaanga, basi ayiche nacho kukwetu chisimosimo mpela yaŵatite pakutumisyilidwa (achimitume) ŵandanda.”
